CSS: #header{background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0a0a0a, #1c1c1c);padding: 20px 0;box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);}.container{display: flex;justify-content: space-between;align-items: center;margin: 0 auto;padding: 0 20px;}.container #logo{height: 50px;}.container nav ul{display: flex;gap: 20px;list-style: none;padding: 0;margin: 0;}.container nav ul li a{color: #FFF;text-decoration: none;font-family: 'Futura', sans-serif;font-size: 16px;padding: 10px 15px;transition: 0.3s ease;}.container nav ul li a:hover{color: #FF4500;}
